overview: Bam Margera, Ryan Dunn, Brandon DiCamillo, and the rest of the crew from MTV's Viva La Bam are at it again! Bam utilizes Ryan Dunn's shrink-ray and takes him on a journey inside Rake Yohn to save his pal from a fate worse than death... A date with local minghag Scabriella!
title: Bamimation
